GLEIF Classified Dataset Partitions
===================================

This dataset has been partitioned into 5 files for GitHub compatibility:

Part 1: gleif_classified_part_1.parquet
Part 2: gleif_classified_part_2.parquet
Part 3: gleif_classified_part_3.parquet
Part 4: gleif_classified_part_4.parquet
Part 5: gleif_classified_part_5.parquet

Total companies: 3,078,018
Columns: LEI, Entity.LegalName, Entity.LegalAddress.Country, Entity.EntityCategory, Entity.EntitySubCategory, canonical_name, brief_name, metals_and_mining, mining, financial, transportation, automotive, technology, healthcare, real_estate, retail_consumer, manufacturing, construction_infrastructure, automotive_transportation, energy_power, electronics_semiconductors, industrial_machinery, aerospace_defense, oil_gas_petrochemicals, chemical_catalytic, clean_tech_renewables, consumer_goods_appliances, maritime_rail, jewelry_investment_coinage, healthcare_medical_devices, recycling_circular_economy

To load the full dataset, use GoodGleif with auto-partition loading.
